item.title: What about Crawling Trump's Tweets and Make it to a Trading Algo?
item.description: Since Twitter has open api and Trump has been dramatically influencing the US stock market for quite some months. I will search if there’re already people doing the identical thing and if not try do write a draft notebook on it. (To be continued.) Update: Alright… See this Github repository trump2cash. I have to agree the author did a great job and es tot mir leid that this is eactly what I was about to do.
